* <!-- A estrutura Settlement representa acordos ou formas de pagamento futuros. Nao constitui em caso algum o somatorio dos descontos concedidos e reflectidos nas linhas dos documentos e a informacao aqui constante nao influi o montante total do documento (GrossTotal) -->
* If there is a need to make more than one reference,
* this structure can be generated as many times as necessary. *
* When this method is invoked a new Settlement is created
* add to the stack and returned to e populate
* Payment method used. In case of mixed payments,
* the amounts shall be indicated by type of mean of payment and date of payment.
* If there is a need to make more than one reference, this structure can
* be generated as many times as necessary.
* Add a PaymentMethod to the Payment stack
* When this method is invoked a new Instance of PaymentMethod is created,
* add to the Payment stack and returned to be populated
* Payment method used. In case of mixed payments,
* the amounts shall be indicated by type of mean of payment and date of payment.
* If there is a need to make more than one reference, this structure can
* be generated as many times as necessary.
